text: In the inaugural edition of the tournament, Venus Williams won the title by defeating Justine Henin 6–3, 5–7, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== The first four seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) 2002 Singles Proximus Diamond Games Proximus Diamond Games Diamond Games
title: 2002 Proximus Diamond Games – Singles
